short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveals images at Sorensen tobakk website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reveals product images at www.msorensen.no and sigar.com

Due to Norwegian health fascism, webshops in Norway are prevented from showing images of tobacco products such as cigars. This extension fights back the suppression!
